homemetatitle: Sci Hibiscus - Every African Under a Roof
metadesc: Sci Hibiscus designs and develops sustainable, modern and accessible housing in Cameroon.
aboutmd: Learn about SCI Hibiscus: our mission for sustainable development, construction quality and local commitment across Cameroon.
careermd: Join a committed team: current vacancies, company culture and benefits. Find open roles and learn how to apply at Sci Hibiscus.
